welcome_message_body: Welcome to Taito, Japan! Get ready to immerse yourself in the rich history and vibrant culture of this charming city, known for its traditional neighborhoods, stunning temples, and delicious street food. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and enjoying all that Taito has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Haneda Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Haneda Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection after a certain period of time.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yokota AFB Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Yokota AFB Airport is used for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
